plot: At summer camp, the boys compete and are seemingly hopelessly outmatched by the female campers.
title: It Was a Short Summer, Charlie Brown
plot_es: At summer camp, the boys compete and are seemingly hopelessly outmatched by the female campers.
original_name: It Was a Short Summer, Charlie Brown
plot_en: At summer camp, the boys compete and are seemingly hopelessly outmatched by the female campers.
